23Words.name: 23Words
23Words.description: Unscramble 23 words, one by one, without running out of time.

Absurdle.name: Absurdle
Absurdle.description: An adversarial version of Wordle that actively avoids giving you the answer.

Actorle.name: Actorle
Actorle.description: Guess the movie actor based on the given information, with each guess revealing matching information.

ActorleFilltheGrid.name: ActorleFilltheGrid
ActorleFilltheGrid.description: Fill the grid with actors that are cast in movies from each cell's corresponding row and column.

ActorleStoryboard.name: ActorleStoryboard
ActorleStoryboard.description: Rearrange the movie frames in chronological order.

ActorleTv.name: ActorleTv
ActorleTv.description: Guess the TV actor based on the given information, with each guess revealing matching information.

Adoptle.name: Adoptle
Adoptle.description: Guess the name of a pet that is up for adoption, given a picture of them.

AirportGuessr.name: AirportGuessr
AirportGuessr.description: Guess the airport given its satellite image.

Angle.name: Angle
Angle.description: Guess the angle in 4 guesses or less.

Anigrams.name: Anigrams
Anigrams.description: Unscramble a series of words, revealing a new letter each time.

Archiguessr.name: Archiguessr
Archiguessr.description: Guess the name of the architecture, given a series of pictures.

Artle.name: Artle
Artle.description: Guess the artist of the shown work of art.

Balatrodle.name: Balatrodle
Balatrodle.description: Guess the Joker from the game Balatro.

Bandle.name: Bandle
Bandle.description: Guess the song, one instrument at a time (sort of).

Betweenle.name: Betweenle
Betweenle.description: Guess the secret word hidden between other words before running out of guesses.

Blunderwall.name: Blunderwall
Blunderwall.description: Find the secret word on the Blunderwall in 4 tries.

Boggdle.name: Boggdle
Boggdle.description: Search for the best 3 words you can find in the Boggle grid.

BoxOfficeGame.name: BoxOfficeGame
BoxOfficeGame.description: Guess the top five movies in the US domestic box office for the given weekend.

BracketCity.name: BracketCity
BracketCity.description: Solve the clues within brackets, eventually completing the puzzle.

BrainbashersDaily30Seconds.name: BrainbashersDaily30Seconds
BrainbashersDaily30Seconds.description: Try to solve the arithmetic questions in 30 seconds, but it is okay if you go over.

Brickdle.name: Brickdle
Brickdle.description: Guess the number of pieces in the pictured LEGO set.

Calcle.name: Calcle
Calcle.description: Guess the numbers in the equation in 5 attempts or less.

Capitale.name: Capitale
Capitale.description: Guess the world capital in as few attempts as possible with the given clues.

Cardle.name: Cardle
Cardle.description: Correctly identify the pictured car's make, model, and year.

Cartoonguessr.name: Cartoonguessr
Cartoonguessr.description: Guess the cartoon character within 15 guesses.

Categories.name: Categories
Categories.description: Group the words in the grid into the 4 secret categories, like Connections or Conexo.

Catfishing.name: Catfishing
Catfishing.description: Guess the Wikipedia article by its categories. 10 rounds per day.

CellTower.name: CellTower
CellTower.description: Divide the grid into regions such that each region represents a word.

Chainagram.name: Chainagram
Chainagram.description: Make a chain linking two words together by changing one letter and making an anagram at each step.

Chess.comDailyPuzzle.name: Chess.comDailyPuzzle
Chess.comDailyPuzzle.description: Solve the daily chess puzzle from chess.com.

Chessguessr.name: Chessguessr
Chessguessr.description: Given a snapshot from a chess game, guess the next 5 moves played.

Chessle.name: Chessle
Chessle.description: Guess today's entire opening Chess sequence.

Chrono.name: Chrono
Chrono.description: Put the events in chronological order in 3 tries or less.

Chronoline.name: Chronoline
Chronoline.description: One by one, place each historical event in the correct spot on the timeline without making 5 mistakes.

Chronophoto.name: Chronophoto
Chronophoto.description: Guess the year in which each historical picture was taken.

Cine2nerdle.name: Cine2nerdle
Cine2nerdle.description: Rearrange the tiles into groups that represent movies/themes. Includes both Original and Reversal.

Cinematrix.name: Cinematrix
Cinematrix.description: Fill out the grid with movies matching the criteria of each cell's row and column. Changes every weekday.

Circuits.name: Circuits
Circuits.description: Place words into the empty boxes so that each connection of two words make a compound word.

Clickword.name: Clickword
Clickword.description: Place letter tiles on the board to make words and score points! Keep placing tiles until you run out.

Cluewords.name: Cluewords
Cluewords.description: Solve the clues to find the hidden words.

Colordle.name: Colordle
Colordle.description: Guess today's color by using color names.

Colorfle.name: Colorfle
Colorfle.description: Figure out the color composition of the given color.

Colorguesser.name: Colorguesser
Colorguesser.description: Guess the actual color that each of the color names represent.

Combinations.name: Combinations
Combinations.description: Create words using combinations of letters from the grid.

CompoundYourJoy.name: CompoundYourJoy
CompoundYourJoy.description: Rearrange the words into a chain of 2-word concepts.

Concludle.name: Concludle
Concludle.description: Guess the secret answer from a series of clues.

Conexo.name: Conexo
Conexo.description: Form groups of 4 words that have something in common.

ConnectionsGame.name: ConnectionsGame
ConnectionsGame.description: Group words that share a common thread. Basically a copy of NYT Connections but with 3 difficulty modes and a good archive.

Contexto.name: Contexto
Contexto.description: Guess words to see how close they are to the secret word in terms of context, eventually guessing the secret word.

Costcodle.name: Costcodle
Costcodle.description: Guess the price of the given Costco item.

Countryle.name: Countryle
Countryle.description: Guess the country in as few attempts as possible with the given clues.

Couples.name: Couples
Couples.description: Guess the chained word pairs in 3 tries.

CrackedSudoku.name: CrackedSudoku
CrackedSudoku.description: Fill the cells with numbers 1-9 without repeating numbers in a dark-outlined group or along a colored run line.

Craftword.name: Craftword
Craftword.description: Get from the starting word to the ending word in as few words as possible. At each step you can either add a letter, remove a letter, change a letter, or rearrange letters.

Crossherd.name: Crossherd
Crossherd.description: A daily mini crossword from Clever Goat.

Crosswordle.name: Crosswordle
Crosswordle.description: Fill in the grid to logically fit a series of Wordle guesses.

Crosswordle.com.name: Crosswordle.com
Crosswordle.com.description: Swap tiles to solve multiple Wordle puzzles crossed together.

Crosswordle.org.name: Crosswordle.org
Crosswordle.org.description: Solve multiple Wordle puzzles crossed together.

Cryptle.name: Cryptle
Cryptle.description: Slide each row of letters in to the right position to guess the secret word. You have 5 guesses.

Cyphr.name: Cyphr
Cyphr.description: Guess letters to form a word on each row of the pyramid, starting from the top row.

DailyDozenTrivia.name: DailyDozenTrivia
DailyDozenTrivia.description: Answer 9 trivia questions from various categories.

DailyFactOrFiction.name: DailyFactOrFiction
DailyFactOrFiction.description: Guess whether today's statement is fact or fiction.

DailyFillIns.name: DailyFillIns
DailyFillIns.description: Properly fill in the clue-less crossword with all of the words from the given word list.

DailyTens.name: DailyTens
DailyTens.description: Guess the top 10 items of today's category.

Daydle.name: Daydle
Daydle.description: Guess the year of a historical event that happened on this day in history.

Daydoku.name: Daydoku
Daydoku.description: Place the polyominoes on the calendar so that every cell is covered except ones that correspond to today's date.

Dbdle.name: Dbdle
Dbdle.description: Test your Dead by Daylight knowledge in these daily games.

Decipher.name: Decipher
Decipher.description: Solve the daily cryptogram to reveal the quote.

Dicele.name: Dicele
Dicele.description: Swap dice to make each row and column sum up to their target number.

DisneyHeardle.name: DisneyHeardle
DisneyHeardle.description: Guess the Disney song from listening to small parts of it.

Disorderly.name: Disorderly
Disorderly.description: Order the items correctly based on the given criteria.

DominoFit.name: DominoFit
DominoFit.description: Fill the board with dominoes so that the dots add up in each row and column.

Doople.name: Doople
Doople.description: Chain word combinations together to fit the given clues.

Dordle.name: Dordle
Dordle.description: Solve 2 Wordle puzzles at the same time.

Dotadle.name: Dotadle
Dotadle.description: Guess the Dota characters in these daily quizzes.

Dungleon.name: Dungleon
Dungleon.description: Guess the dungeon's composition in 6 guesses.

Duotrigordle.name: Duotrigordle
Duotrigordle.description: Solve 32 Wordle puzzles at the same time.

Eightile.name: Eightile
Eightile.description: Unscramble each word, adding a new letter each time. You have 5 minutes.

Eruptle.name: Eruptle
Eruptle.description: Guess the 10 items that fit the prompt, kind of like Family Feud.

FaceGuessr.name: FaceGuessr
FaceGuessr.description: Guess the pixelated face of today's notable figure.

Facedle.name: Facedle
Facedle.description: Guess the famous person in the partially covered picture.

Faces.name: Faces
Faces.description: Guess the names of the movie stars that are blended together into a single image.

Factle.name: Factle
Factle.description: Find and properly rank the top 5 answers for the given criteria. You have 5 guesses to get it correct.

FactleSports.name: FactleSports
FactleSports.description: Find and properly rank the top 5 answers for the given sports-related criteria. You have 5 guesses to get it correct.

Fibble.name: Fibble
Fibble.description: Wordle but it lies to you.  (Like Lirdle)

Figure.name: Figure
Figure.description: Clear all of the tiles before running out of moves.

Flagdle.name: Flagdle
Flagdle.description: Guess the country by its flag.

Flagdoku.name: Flagdoku
Flagdoku.description: Fill in the grid with flags that meet the criteria of both the row and column corresponding to their cell.

Flagle.name: Flagle
Flagle.description: Guess the flag in 5 guesses or less.

FlagleGame.name: FlagleGame
FlagleGame.description: Guess the hidden flag in six guesses, revealing where your guess overlaps with the solution after each try.

Flickle.name: Flickle
Flickle.description: Guess the movie based on the given video clips.

Flipple.name: Flipple
Flipple.description: Transform the starting word to the target word by changing one letter at a time

Foodguessr.name: Foodguessr
Foodguessr.description: Guess what country each of the food dishes are from.

Fusele.name: Fusele
Fusele.description: A Wordle variant in which each row has a unique twist.

GamedleArtwork.name: GamedleArtwork
GamedleArtwork.description: Guess the video game by its artwork.

GamedleClassic.name: GamedleClassic
GamedleClassic.description: Guess the video game by its cover.

GamedleGuess.name: GamedleGuess
GamedleGuess.description: Guess the video game by its specifications.

GamedleKeywords.name: GamedleKeywords
GamedleKeywords.description: Guess the video game by keywords.

Gaps.name: Gaps
Gaps.description: Guess the movie based on the blanks and given information.

Geocircles.name: Geocircles
Geocircles.description: Given a streetview location, place progressively smaller circles on the map to help pinpoint its exact coordinates.

Geoconnections.name: Geoconnections
Geoconnections.description: Group mostly geography-related pictures that share a common theme.

Geodle.name: Geodle
Geodle.description: Guess today's mystery country within 7 guesses.

Geographle.name: Geographle
Geographle.description: Find out where you are in the world in as few guesses as you can.

Geogrid.name: Geogrid
Geogrid.description: Fill in the grid with countries that match each cell's corresponding row and column categories.

Globle.name: Globle
Globle.description: Guess the mystery country, given how close it is to each guessed country.

GlobleCapitals.name: GlobleCapitals
GlobleCapitals.description: Guess the mystery world capital, given how close it is to each guessed world capital.

GramJam.name: GramJam
GramJam.description: Clear the board in under 20 swaps, clearing letters by creating words on full rows or columns.

Graphs.world.name: Graphs.world
Graphs.world.description: Select the dataset that fits the displayed graph.

Griddle.name: Griddle
Griddle.description: Form words by placing letters on the board to get the highest score you can in this Scrabble-like daily game.

GuessMyWord.name: GuessMyWord
GuessMyWord.description: Make guesses and see if they are alphabetically before or after the secret word.

GuesstheAudio.name: GuesstheAudio
GuesstheAudio.description: Guess the song from listening to small parts of it, getting a clue after each guess.

GuesstheGame.name: GuesstheGame
GuesstheGame.description: Guess the video game by its cropped screenshots.

Harmonies:MusicConnections.name: Harmonies:MusicConnections
Harmonies:MusicConnections.description: Find the groups of 4 that share some musical theme.

Heardle1950's.name: Heardle1950's
Heardle1950's.description: Guess the 1950's song from listening to small parts of it.

Heardle1960's.name: Heardle1960's
Heardle1960's.description: Guess the 1960's song from listening to small parts of it.

Heardle1970's.name: Heardle1970's
Heardle1970's.description: Guess the 1970's song from listening to small parts of it.

Heardle1980's.name: Heardle1980's
Heardle1980's.description: Guess the 1980's song from listening to small parts of it.

Heardle1990's.name: Heardle1990's
Heardle1990's.description: Guess the 1990's song from listening to small parts of it.

Heardle2000's.name: Heardle2000's
Heardle2000's.description: Guess the 2000's song from listening to small parts of it.

Heardle2010's.name: Heardle2010's
Heardle2010's.description: Guess the 2010's song from listening to small parts of it.

HeardleTvThemes.name: HeardleTvThemes
HeardleTvThemes.description: Guess the TV theme song from listening to small parts of it.

HelloWordl.name: HelloWordl
HelloWordl.description: Play Wordle puzzles from 4 to 11 letters long.

Hexcodle.name: Hexcodle
Hexcodle.description: Guess the 6-digit hex code of the shown color in 5 tries or less.

HexcodleMini.name: HexcodleMini
HexcodleMini.description: Guess the 3-digit hex code of the shown color in 5 tries or less. Easier version of Hexcodle.

HiddenMirrors.name: HiddenMirrors
HiddenMirrors.description: A unique daily symmetry game where you try to match the given pattern.

HitoriConquest.name: HitoriConquest
HitoriConquest.description: Eliminate cells in the grid to remove row or column duplicates and satisfy the given rules.

Housle.name: Housle
Housle.description: Guess the price of the house, given pictures of parts of the house.

HowlongtobeatDailyChallenge.name: HowlongtobeatDailyChallenge
HowlongtobeatDailyChallenge.description: Guess how long it takes to beat the given video game. Use power-ups if you need help.

Huewords.name: Huewords
Huewords.description: Fill the partitioned grid with letters to form 5-letter words, choosing from the given groups of letters.

ICalledGame.name: ICalledGame
ICalledGame.description: Identify key details from an image of a historical NBA game to answer 6 questions.

ImmaculateFooty.name: ImmaculateFooty
ImmaculateFooty.description: Fill out the grid with soccer players matching the criteria of each cell's row and column.

ImmaculateGrid:Baseball.name: ImmaculateGrid:Baseball
ImmaculateGrid:Baseball.description: Fill out the grid with baseball players matching the criteria of each cell's row and column.

ImmaculateGrid:Hockey.name: ImmaculateGrid:Hockey
ImmaculateGrid:Hockey.description: Fill out the grid with hockey players matching the criteria of each cell's row and column.

ImmaculateGrid:Men'sBasketball.name: ImmaculateGrid:Men'sBasketball
ImmaculateGrid:Men'sBasketball.description: Fill out the grid with men's basketball players matching the criteria of each cell's row and column.

ImmaculateGrid:ProFootball.name: ImmaculateGrid:ProFootball
ImmaculateGrid:ProFootball.description: Fill out the grid with pro football players matching the criteria of each cell's row and column.

ImmaculateGrid:Women'sBasketball.name: ImmaculateGrid:Women'sBasketball
ImmaculateGrid:Women'sBasketball.description: Fill out the grid with women's basketball players matching the criteria of each cell's row and column.

Isaacle.name: Isaacle
Isaacle.description: Guess the items from the game The Binding of Isaac in these daily quizzes.

Isaaconnect.name: Isaaconnect
Isaaconnect.description: Group items from The Binding of Isaac that share a common theme.

Iykyk.name: Iykyk
Iykyk.description: Guess what today's acronym stands for. By the makers of the card game CultureTags.

Jeopardle.name: Jeopardle
Jeopardle.description: Answer today's Jeopardy questions from the given category.

Jumblie.name: Jumblie
Jumblie.description: Find the 4 themed words hidden amongst the letters such that all letters are used exactly once.

Juxtastat.name: Juxtastat
Juxtastat.description: For 5 rounds, guess which of the two regions better fits the given criteria.

Karat.name: Karat
Karat.description: Turn the rings of the ingot until each side forms a word - in 24 turns or less.

Keyword.name: Keyword
Keyword.description: Find the target word by guessing the final letter of the vertical words.

LaTimesCrossword.name: LaTimesCrossword
LaTimesCrossword.description: Solve today's crossword from the Los Angeles Times.

Letroso.name: Letroso
Letroso.description: Guess the secret word that can be up to 10 letters long.

Letterloop.name: Letterloop
Letterloop.description: Place the 8 letters in the circle to make two 5-letter words that share their first and last letters.

Letterset.name: Letterset
Letterset.description: Spell words with the given letters to earn points. Longer words help prolong the game and earn more points.

Lex.gamesByaVowel.name: Lex.gamesByaVowel
Lex.gamesByaVowel.description: Unjumble five words by inserting a unique vowel into each word.

Lex.gamesConlextions.name: Lex.gamesConlextions
Lex.gamesConlextions.description: Group words that share a common thread, like Connections.

Lex.gamesLexicogs.name: Lex.gamesLexicogs
Lex.gamesLexicogs.description: Solve today's clues by combining blocks of letters. Like the game 7 Little Words.

Lex.gamesMiniCrossword.name: Lex.gamesMiniCrossword
Lex.gamesMiniCrossword.description: A daily mini crossword from Lex.Games

Lex.gamesSixAppeal.name: Lex.gamesSixAppeal
Lex.gamesSixAppeal.description: Guess the 6-letter word, like Wordle, but you don't have to guess real words. The answer is a real word.

Lex.gamesSquareDance.name: Lex.gamesSquareDance
Lex.gamesSquareDance.description: Make a word with each group of letters, but you must add a letter to each word.

Lingule.name: Lingule
Lingule.description: Guess the language of the today's word in 6 guesses or less.

Linkr.name: Linkr
Linkr.description: Link each pair of numbered points together in three daily puzzles.

Linxicon.name: Linxicon
Linxicon.description: Connect two random words by creating a chain of new words that bridge the gap in their meanings.

Lirdle.name: Lirdle
Lirdle.description: Wordle except each line contains a lie. (Like Fibble)

ListThemAll!.name: ListThemAll!
ListThemAll!.description: List all of the items that fit today's category.

Listed.name: Listed
Listed.description: Guess the price of the recently sold property.

Locatle.name: Locatle
Locatle.description: Guess the country that the picture was taken in.

Logiquiz.name: Logiquiz
Logiquiz.description: A self-referential logic quiz with 5 difficulty modes.

Loldle.name: Loldle
Loldle.description: A bunch of daily games where you guess the champion from League of Legends.

Lyricle.name: Lyricle
Lyricle.description: Guess the song from the given lyrics.

MahjongHandle.name: MahjongHandle
MahjongHandle.description: Guess the Riichi Mahjong hand in 6 tries.

Mapgame.name: Mapgame
Mapgame.description: Use the map to guess a country, getting new hints after each guess.

Mathler.name: Mathler
Mathler.description: Find the hidden calculation that equals the given number.

Mazele.name: Mazele
Mazele.description: Guess the correct maze path in the grid in 6 tries or less.

Metaflora.name: Metaflora
Metaflora.description: Guess plants to see where they share common ancestors with the mystery plant, eventually guessing the mystery plant.

Metazooa.name: Metazooa
Metazooa.description: Guess animals to see where they share common ancestors with the mystery animal, eventually guessing the mystery animal.

Mcdle.name: Mcdle
Mcdle.description: Test your Minecraft knowledge in these daily games.

Minecraftle.name: Minecraftle
Minecraftle.description: Guess the crafting recipe from the game Minecraft.

MiniCrossword(theObserver).name: MiniCrossword(theObserver)
MiniCrossword(theObserver).description: A daily mini crossword from The Observer.

Mislettered.name: Mislettered
Mislettered.description: Solve the word or phrase by guessing one letter at a time.

MlbPickle.name: MlbPickle
MlbPickle.description: Guess today's mystery MLB player within nine guesses.

More/less.name: More/less
More/less.description: Decide which option has more or less, and keep going until you get one wrong. There are 3 categories to play.

Morsle.name: Morsle
Morsle.description: Guess the word played out loud in Morse code. You have 21 guesses, but replaying the audio counts as a guess. Features a very helpful cheatsheet.

MovieGrid.name: MovieGrid
MovieGrid.description: Fill out the grid with movies matching the criteria of each cell's row and column.

MoviePyramid.name: MoviePyramid
MoviePyramid.description: Fill in the cells of the pyramid with movies that match the criteria of their given row.

MovieReveal.name: MovieReveal
MovieReveal.description: Guess today's hidden movie by revealing clues that cost you points!

MovieSnake.name: MovieSnake
MovieSnake.description: Guess movies that match pairs of criteria until all clues have been used.

MovietoMovie.name: MovietoMovie
MovietoMovie.description: Connect two movies by jumping through actors and the movies they've been in.

Moviedle.name: Moviedle
Moviedle.description: Guess the movie based on the given information, with each guess revealing matching information.

Moviedle(fromHistordle).name: Moviedle(fromHistordle)
Moviedle(fromHistordle).description: Guess the year that the given movies were released.

MoviedleFilltheGrid.name: MoviedleFilltheGrid
MoviedleFilltheGrid.description: Fill the grid with movies that contain actors from each cell's corresponding row and column.

MoviedleMoviemoji.name: MoviedleMoviemoji
MoviedleMoviemoji.description: Guess the movie based on the given emojis.

Moview.name: Moview
Moview.description: Guess the movie, starting with a single review from Letterboxd. Gain more information after each incorrect guess.

Musicdoku.name: Musicdoku
Musicdoku.description: Fill in the grid with songs that meet the criteria of both the row and column corresponding to their cell.

Neighborle.name: Neighborle
Neighborle.description: Guess the countries that border the highlighted country on the map.

NumberIsland.name: NumberIsland
NumberIsland.description: Divide the number board into islands that match the target sums.

Numble.name: Numble
Numble.description: Reach the target number only using operations and each given number exactly once.

Numbobulate.name: Numbobulate
Numbobulate.description: Use the numbers and operations in the square to reach the target number.

Connections.name: Connections
Connections.description: Group words that share a common thread.

NytConnections:SportsEdition.name: NytConnections:SportsEdition
NytConnections:SportsEdition.description: Group sports terms that share a common thread.

NytMiniCrossword.name: NytMiniCrossword
NytMiniCrossword.description: A very small crossword puzzle by the New York Times.

NytStrands.name: NytStrands
NytStrands.description: Find hidden words and uncover the day's theme.

NytSudoku.name: NytSudoku
NytSudoku.description: Daily Sudoku puzzles from the New York Times.

Octordle.name: Octordle
Octordle.description: Solve 8 Wordle puzzles at the same time. You have 13 guesses.

OecConnectrade.name: OecConnectrade
OecConnectrade.description: Form groups of four exported products that are associated with one of the given countries.

OecPick5.name: OecPick5
OecPick5.description: Guess the top 5 countries that export the most of the given product.

OecTradle.name: OecTradle
OecTradle.description: Guess the country by its exports.

OntheRecord.name: OntheRecord
OntheRecord.description: Answer the question based on the given quote, Monday through Thursday. Every Friday, you get 10 questions that will last through the weekend.

OneUpPuzzle.name: OneUpPuzzle
OneUpPuzzle.description: Sudoku-style game where you need to fill segmented rows and columns with numbers.

OneWordSearch.name: OneWordSearch
OneWordSearch.description: Repeatedly search for the only word in a grid of letters.

Orbits.name: Orbits
Orbits.description: Place the 8 words in the correct order in the orbit by creating compound words or 2-word phrases.

OrderUp.name: OrderUp
OrderUp.description: Arrange the themed items in the correct order within 5 guesses.

Outword.name: Outword
Outword.description: Create 2 words from the given letters. Each letter has a base value and some letters have multipliers, like in Scrabble.

Pandergram.name: Pandergram
Pandergram.description: Swap out letters from the given words to create new words that together use the entire alphabet.

Pedantle.name: Pedantle
Pedantle.description: Find the secret Wikipedia page by revealing the words in its introduction.

PerfectPitchPuzzle.name: PerfectPitchPuzzle
PerfectPitchPuzzle.description: After listening to a short tune, identify the first 6 notes that were played.

Petdle.name: Petdle
Petdle.description: Guess the pet taken from the game Super Auto Pets.

Phrasle.name: Phrasle
Phrasle.description: Reveal the phrase by guessing one letter at a time.

Picsey.name: Picsey
Picsey.description: Identify today's picture by flipping over as few tiles as possible.

Pivots.name: Pivots
Pivots.description: Sort the board by pivoting parts of it at a time.

Planespottle.name: Planespottle
Planespottle.description: Given an image of an airplane, determine the make, type, and the airline it belongs to.

Plotwords.name: Plotwords
Plotwords.description: Guess the name of the movie using as few plot keywords as possible!

Plusword.name: Plusword
Plusword.description: Solve the mini crossword, then use letters in the shaded squares to figure out an additional word.

PocketPuzzles.name: PocketPuzzles
PocketPuzzles.description: A collection of daily word games.

Poeltl.name: Poeltl
Poeltl.description: Guess the NBA player in 8 guesses.

Pokedle.name: Pokedle
Pokedle.description: Guess the Pokemon in these daily quizzes.

Pokedoku.name: Pokedoku
Pokedoku.description: Fill out the grid with Pokmon matching the criteria of each cell's row and column.

Pokle.name: Pokle
Pokle.description: Guess the 5 board cards in this daily Texas Holdem challenge.

Polygonle.name: Polygonle
Polygonle.description: Guess the word in 6 tries, like Wordle. Each unique shape over a column represents a letter.

Popcultured.name: Popcultured
Popcultured.description: Guess the year given three pop culture items released that year.

Primel.name: Primel
Primel.description: Guess the 5-digit prime number in six guesses or less.

Puckdoku.name: Puckdoku
Puckdoku.description: Fill out the grid with hockey players matching the criteria of each cell's row and column.

Pufferdle.name: Pufferdle
Pufferdle.description: Catch a fish from the game Stardew Valley and then guess what fish it was.

PuzzmoFlipart.name: PuzzmoFlipart
PuzzmoFlipart.description: Rotate the pieces to fit them within the frame.

PuzzmoReallyBadChess.name: PuzzmoReallyBadChess
PuzzmoReallyBadChess.description: Checkmate the opponent's king in this randomized Chess variant.

PuzzmoSpelltower.name: PuzzmoSpelltower
PuzzmoSpelltower.description: Find words to clear tiles in the falling grid.

PuzzmoTypeshift.name: PuzzmoTypeshift
PuzzmoTypeshift.description: Slide columns of letters to make words, using all of the letters along the way.

Quickq.name: Quickq
Quickq.description: A 90 second trivia game with questions from 8 categories.

Quintessential.name: Quintessential
Quintessential.description: Solve each of the 5 horizontal words in as few swaps as possible.

Quordle.name: Quordle
Quordle.description: Solve 4 Wordle puzzles at the same time.

RealBirdFakeBird.name: RealBirdFakeBird
RealBirdFakeBird.description: Guess if each of the 7 prompts are real or fake (made up or don't belong).

Reciple.name: Reciple
Reciple.description: Guess the ingredients of today's recipe.

Redactle.name: Redactle
Redactle.description: Guess the Wikipedia article by its content with keywords redacted.

Regexle.com.name: Regexle.com
Regexle.com.description: Fill in the hexagon with sequences of characters that match the regular expressions listed around the edges.

Regexle.ithea.de.name: Regexle.ithea.de
Regexle.ithea.de.description: Guess the secret regular expression by testing sequences of characters.

Reheardle.name: Reheardle
Reheardle.description: Guess the song from listening to small parts of it.

ReheardleVideoGames.name: ReheardleVideoGames
ReheardleVideoGames.description: Guess the video game track from listening to small parts of it.

Relatle.name: Relatle
Relatle.description: Guess the word based on one of its synonyms, given a new synonym after each guess.

Relatle.io.name: Relatle.io
Relatle.io.description: Get from one musical artist to another by linking through related artists.

RhymeTime.name: RhymeTime
RhymeTime.description: Guess the three words that all rhyme.

Rivadle.name: Rivadle
Rivadle.description: A bunch of daily games where you guess the character from Marvel Rivals.

Rogule.name: Rogule
Rogule.description: A daily emoji dungeon crawler roguelike.

Rotaboxes.name: Rotaboxes
Rotaboxes.description: Rotate all the tiles into their correct orientation to reveal today's picture.

Satle.name: Satle
Satle.description: Guess the city given a satellite image, zooming out after each guess.

Scramble.name: Scramble
Scramble.description: Guess as many valid words as possible for each row of a scrambled grid of letters.

Searchle.name: Searchle
Searchle.description: Guess the secret word of the day by completing the Google search prompt.

Sedecordle.name: Sedecordle
Sedecordle.description: Solve 16 wordles at the same time. You have 21 guesses.

Semantle.name: Semantle
Semantle.description: Guess words to see how close they are to the secret word semantically, eventually guessing the secret word.

Sequences.name: Sequences
Sequences.description: Guess the next number in today's sequence.

SexagintaQuattuordle.name: SexagintaQuattuordle
SexagintaQuattuordle.description: Solve 64 Wordle puzzles at the same time.

Shaple.name: Shaple
Shaple.description: Choose the shape that matches the top shape.

ShikakuoftheDay.name: ShikakuoftheDay
ShikakuoftheDay.description: 5 daily Shikaku puzzles where you partition a grid into rectangles whose areas match the number inside them.

Smashdle.name: Smashdle
Smashdle.description: A bunch of daily games where you guess the character from Super Smash Bros.

Songle.name: Songle
Songle.description: Guess the year given three songs that were released that year.

Songless.name: Songless
Songless.description: Guess the song from listening to small parts of it.

Sorted.name: Sorted
Sorted.description: Place the items in the correct order, 3 new rounds everyday.

Soulsborndle.name: Soulsborndle
Soulsborndle.description: Guess bosses from the Soulsborne games by their health, souls, weaknesses and resistances. For fans of Elden Ring, Dark Souls, Demon Souls, and Bloodborne.

Spaceword.name: Spaceword
Spaceword.description: Create crosswords using all letters, using as little space as possible.

SpellBee.name: SpellBee
SpellBee.description: Create words using the given 7 letters. Each word must contain the center letter.

Spellcheck.name: Spellcheck
Spellcheck.description: Spell the words correctly after listening to them.

Spellie.name: Spellie
Spellie.description: Wordle for young spellers with 3 difficulty modes.

SpellingBee.name: SpellingBee
SpellingBee.description: Given 7 letters, make as many words as you can that contain the center letter. Same as NYT Spelling Bee, which requires a subscription.

Spindle.name: Spindle
Spindle.description: Rearrange the grid of letters so that the target word is spelled out. Rearranging is done by spinning words.

Spotle.name: Spotle
Spotle.description: Guess the music artist in 10 tries, gaining new information based on each guess.

Squardle.name: Squardle
Squardle.description: A complex Wordle variant where your guesses count in two directions and cycle between three positions.

Squaredle.name: Squaredle
Squaredle.description: Find all the hidden words in a grid by connecting letters horizontally, vertically, or diagonally. Two puzzles each day.

Squares.name: Squares
Squares.description: Find all of the words in this daily Boggle game.

Squareword.name: Squareword
Squareword.description: Guess 5-letter words to uncover the square of words both horizontally and vertically.

Squeezy.name: Squeezy
Squeezy.description: Insert the given letters into the given words to make new words and reveal the secret word, phrase, or name.

Stacked.name: Stacked
Stacked.description: Find groups of different sizes that share something in common.

Stackle.name: Stackle
Stackle.description: Build the tallest possible stack of words, swapping out one letter and scrambling the rest with each new word.

Statele.name: Statele
Statele.description: Guess the US State by its outline on the map.

Stepdle.name: Stepdle
Stepdle.description: Solve 4 Wordle puzzles, one at a time, each word one letter longer than the last. You have 20 total guesses.

SummitGame.name: SummitGame
SummitGame.description: With one clue to get you started, find the 5 interconnected words to complete the summit in the shortest time.

Summle.name: Summle
Summle.description: Reach the target number using the given numbers and operations. Includes a junior mode and hard mode.

Sumplete.name: Sumplete
Sumplete.description: Delete numbers so that each row and column adds up to their target number.

Survivle.name: Survivle
Survivle.description: Try to lose the Wordle game by guessing 7 or more times, but you must utilize all gained information for each guess.

Syllacrostic.name: Syllacrostic
Syllacrostic.description: Combine syllables to solve the clues.

Symble.name: Symble
Symble.description: A Wordle variant in which each game includes 3 randomly generated symbols, each meaning something different.

Synthmaze.name: Synthmaze
Synthmaze.description: Swap tiles in the maze so that the rocket reaches the exit.

Terradle.name: Terradle
Terradle.description: Guess today's weapon from the game Terraria.

TheDailyBurgle.name: TheDailyBurgle
TheDailyBurgle.description: Burgle the vault by guessing movies whose plot descriptions contain words from the vault! By CineNerdle.

TheWikiGameDaily.name: TheWikiGameDaily
TheWikiGameDaily.description: Race from one Wikipedia page to the target page using as few links as possible

Threepeat.name: Threepeat
Threepeat.description: Complete three words with the same three letters, three rounds everyday.

Thrice.name: Thrice
Thrice.description: Answer today's 5 trivia questions, each from a different category.

Tightrope.name: Tightrope
Tightrope.description: Answer 9 timed trivia questions without running out of lives!

Timeguessr.name: Timeguessr
Timeguessr.description: Guess the right time and location of each historical photo.

Toddle.name: Toddle
Toddle.description: Guess the secret word or phrase, starting with a 4-letter word whose letters appear in the same order.

Top5.name: Top5
Top5.description: Guess the top 5 items of today's category.

Toppled.name: Toppled
Toppled.description: Topple the letter wall by finding four 5-letter words

Travle.name: Travle
Travle.description: Connect the starting country to the ending country by naming countries in between them.

Triplets.name: Triplets
Triplets.description: Find as many triplets as you can in 3 minutes. A triplet is a set of 3 cards whose attributes are either all the same or all different.

TwoferGoofer.name: TwoferGoofer
TwoferGoofer.description: Guess the pair of rhyming words that form the given nonsensical phrase.

Unolingo.name: Unolingo
Unolingo.description: Solve the clueless crossword by using each letter of the English alphabet exactly once.

Unzoomed.name: Unzoomed
Unzoomed.description: Guess the city based on the given satellite image.

Valodle.name: Valodle
Valodle.description: Test your Valorant knowledge in these daily games.

VideoGameBandle.name: VideoGameBandle
VideoGameBandle.description: Guess the video game and song played by the MIDI band

Videopuzzle.name: Videopuzzle
Videopuzzle.description: Swap tiles to unscramble the puzzle of a looping short video.

VowelPlay.name: VowelPlay
VowelPlay.description: Guess the words with their vowels removed.

VoxDailyCrossword.name: VoxDailyCrossword
VoxDailyCrossword.description: A free daily crossword from Vox, skips Sundays.

Waffle.name: Waffle
Waffle.description: Swap letters to create words both horizontally and vertically. Seems to have been made before Word Waffle.

Weaver.name: Weaver
Weaver.description: Weave your way from the start word to the end word, changing only one letter at a time.

Weddle.name: Weddle
Weddle.description: Guess the NFL player within 8 guesses.

Whentaken.name: Whentaken
Whentaken.description: Guess the year and location of the given photo.

WhentakenMovies.name: WhentakenMovies
WhentakenMovies.description: Guess where and when the given movie scene was filmed.

WhereintheUsaIsThis?.name: WhereintheUsaIsThis?
WhereintheUsaIsThis?.description: Guess the location in the United States given 5 pictures of the same place, one at a time.

Wheretaken.name: Wheretaken
Wheretaken.description: Guess the Country/Region in which the photo was taken.

WheretakenUsa.name: WheretakenUsa
WheretakenUsa.description: Guess the US State in which the photo was taken.

Worchle.name: Worchle
Worchle.description: Find the keyword in the word search before running out of guesses. Three increasingly difficult puzzles everyday.

WordBox.name: WordBox
WordBox.description: Swap letters until each row and column forms a valid word.

WordChain.name: WordChain
WordChain.description: Connect the two unrelated words by adding a chain of related words between them.

WordChase.name: WordChase
WordChase.description: Guess the secret word within 5 tries, receiving a new word as a hint before each guess.

WordConnection.name: WordConnection
WordConnection.description: Link a chain of 4 relevant words together.

WordGrid.name: WordGrid
WordGrid.description: Fill the cells in the grid with words matching the criteria of both their row and column

WordPeaks.name: WordPeaks
WordPeaks.description: Guess the word in 6 tries. After each guess, it will show whether each letter occurs earlier or later in the alphabet compared to the corresponding letter in the secret word.

WordWaffle.name: WordWaffle
WordWaffle.description: Swap letters to create words both horizontally and vertically.

Word500.name: Word500
Word500.description: Guess the word in 8 tries, but you're only given how many guessed letters are in the right place or wrong place.

Wordall.name: Wordall
Wordall.description: Guess all of the Wordle words, given the starting clues.

Wordga.name: Wordga
Wordga.description: Find as many 4+ letter words using today's letters.

Wordiply.name: Wordiply
Wordiply.description: Try to make the longest word that contains the given word in 5 tries or less.

Wordistance.name: Wordistance
Wordistance.description: Keep guessing words until you find the mystery word, each guess revealing the distance between the guessed word and mystery word.

Wordless.name: Wordless
Wordless.description: Solve Wordle puzzles of various sizes.

Wordlinx.name: Wordlinx
Wordlinx.description: Using a single word as a clue, guess the 4 related words by dragging and dropping letters into the empty spaces.

Worldle.name: Worldle
Worldle.description: Guess the country by its shape on the world map.

Xdle.name: Xdle
Xdle.description: Guess the number between 1 and 999, receiving math clues related to each guess. You have 6 guesses.

Yeardle.name: Yeardle
Yeardle.description: Guess the year based on the given historical events of that year.

ZakuChess.name: ZakuChess
ZakuChess.description: A challenging chess game with fantasy pixel-art characters. Note that the chess board is rotated 90 degrees clockwise.

ZebraPuzzles.name: ZebraPuzzles
ZebraPuzzles.description: A collection of 5 daily logic puzzles of increasing difficulty.

Zeldadle.name: Zeldadle
Zeldadle.description: Test your Zelda knowledge in these daily games.

Zoomout.name: Zoomout
Zoomout.description: Guess the video game from the zoomed-in screenshot.
